title: Did Killian Conway's opening dress copy a pattern of simplicity in the 1970s?
subtitle: A picture indicates that Killian Conway's opening band was similar to the 1970 "implicity" pattern that was manipulated.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Gucci group, which the Trump Killian Conway consultant wore to the inauguration ceremony, almost resembled the "implicity" pattern of the 1970s.
